channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for HI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for HI

item.title: Report X-2023061350
item.description:
Report X-2023061350

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-22T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-16
  • City: HONOLULU
  • State: HI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A DECLARED LEAKING DANGEROUS GOODS PACKAGE THAT WAS MARKED AND LABELED UN1987 ALCOHOLS N.O.S. WITH ACCEPTANCE AUDITED SHIPPING PAPERS. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED 2 X 1 GALLON CONTAINERS OF PURELL FOODSERVICE SURFACE SANITIZERS. THE BOX WAS FILLED WITH AIR BAGS AND ABSORBENT PADS AROUND AND IN-BETWEEN THE INDIVIDUAL BOTTLES. ONE BOTTLE REMAINED INTACT. ONE BOTTLE WAS CRACKED LEAKING ALMOST THE ENTIRE CONTENTS.
